Html:
Hi, I am trying to put vertical text into column header (from top to bottom, so that text is 90 degrees rotated), but with no luck.

Are there any solution for this?

 

Also, how to properly configure XSL so that words are wrapped inside a table cell?

Cheers,

Denis

Hi Denis

FO.NET does not support vertical text - sorry!

Mark

Hi griffm,

Do you have any plans for supporting vertical text in FO.NET?

Hi Denis

FO.NET was released to the community in the hope that it may be useful in its current form. I do not actively develop it and there has not been any significant change to FO.NET for several years.

If you need deeper support for XSL:FO, then I would suggest a commercial renderer such as RenderX. Though I understand that if your project is open source, then a commercial product may not be suitable.

Cheers
Mark
